thread.title: Huff Supports Rentrak / comScore Merger - Yahoo Finance
thread.title_full: Huff Supports Rentrak / comScore Merger - Yahoo Finance

author: WRH Partners II, L.L.C.
title: Huff Supports Rentrak / comScore Merger - Yahoo Finance
text:
STUART, Fla., Sept. 30, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- William R. Huff, Managing General Partner of WRH Partners II, L.L.C., based in Stuart, FL, is a long-time telecom and media investor. He was the visionary investor who, in 2008, believed that Rentrak Corporation ( RENT ) could transition from a DVD delivery business to a cutting edge multiscreen media and analytics business. He provided the following commentary on the merger of Rentrak and comScore, Inc. ( SCOR ):
"I am highly supportive of merging Rentrak and comScore and will vote in favor of the transaction. I believe that this deal has incredible strategic logic and will produce tremendous synergies. The combination will have a big multiplier effect and unlock substantial shareholder value. This multiscreen measurement solution will serve as a unique industry platform which is well positioned for dramatic growth over the next five years."
Contact: 
Bryan Bloom
WRH Partners II, L.L.C.
973-984-1233


To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/huff-supports-rentrak--comscore-merger-300151851.html
